Smart Coat Rack: A coat rack with built-in sensors that can detect when a coat is hung up and when it's ready to be taken down. It can also keep track of the number of coats hung up and send a notification when the rack is full.
Modular Coat Rack: A coat rack that can be customized to fit any space, with different modules that can be added or removed to accommodate various sizes and styles of coats.
Multi-Purpose Coat Rack: A coat rack that doubles as a shelf, with built-in hooks for bags, hats, and other accessories.
Eco-Friendly Coat Rack: A coat rack made from sustainable materials, such as bamboo or recycled metal, with a design that minimizes waste and encourages energy efficiency.

Smart Storage Coat Rack: A coat rack with built-in technology that allows users to track the location of their coats and other items, with the option to set reminders for when to pick up or return them.
